            <link linkend="SOCref.Configuration.Component">Components</link>
          </emphasis> </para>

      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="SOCref.Configuration.External_component_plugins">External component plugins</link>

    </itemizedlist>
